title: Skin Idea "Lord Zed"
body: I don't know why zeds always reminded  me of lord zed from power ranges and I think a skin based of him would be cool

replies.body: His original skin has reference to it
I dunno it was on the active list for me, I don't tend to look at dates
What about an Avadon referencing Zed skin?
I would prefer a zed that looks like shredder from the teenage mutant ninja turtles, or better yet a ninja turtle style characterXD
Well ramus kinda has a ninja turtle skin
How about an avocado sed with swords made of orange peels? good for ur health at least :D perhaps i can tell {{champion:432}}  to stop being obese :D
